page.title: 12BRISTOL WALL DECORATIONS
page.content: {WESTBURY PARK In my bed_room just above my bed I've got a scene from "The Hobbit" which cleverly reflects light in different shades.Above my desk I've got a mirror with a picture of a B.M.X.on it.This was given to me for Christmas.To the left of my window I've got a poster of Snoopy given me by my Dad when he came back from America. In the lounge we've got a pen and ink drawing by Simon Drew of a bird flying just in front of a zip closing up the sky. In the kitchen are a couple of plates one with patterns on,which my Nan got from a jumble sale and another with a picture of a famous inventor called Brunel which my Mum got from an art shop.
